item.title: Help me with login yell tag please!
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

if (playerRights == 0) { if (npcKills >= 1000 && npcKills < 2000) { //blah blah } else if (npcKills >= 2000) { //blah blah } }
You can’t just randomly change variable names. You’ll need to create a new variable named pkKills, I’d assume the npcKills variable is in the Player class.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with login yell tag please!

item.title: Help me with login yell tag please!
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

So what i want to do is like,once a player reaches 2000kills in pvp i want their login title to say like this “[PKING GAWD] (name) has just logged in,everyone RAPE THIS PLAYER NOW!” i know how to do that,but that only works if they get 1000NPC KILLS.but i want it to change to 1000kills,how can i do this?

That’s what it looks like,and if i change npc to “pkkills” doesn’t work i get 1 error
Btw,i could just let them post on forums that they got 2000kills in pvp and get the title,but i want an automated one,you know what i mean?

if (playerRights == 0 && (npcKills >= 1000)) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; getDH().sendDialogues(28, npcType); c2.sendMessage("<shad=7534554>[Member] " +playerName+ " has just logged in,everyone RAPE THIS PLAYER NOW!"); } } }

HELP PLEASE! THX!
Btw this is in my client.java file,I need help how i can change this to pk kills isntead of npckills,like is it in another file or something that i have to change?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with login yell tag please!
